Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2008 01:04PM lorac wrote: Oh, I'm so excited to find your recipe!   It happens I have all the ingredients and will whip it up tomorrow.   We had this at a church dinner in Oxford several years ago and loved it.  We were there on a sabbatical and had attended the church in the morning and were invited to the potluck later in the day.  I couldn't think of what to take as our contribution so I bought graham biscuits (crackers) chocolate bars and marshmallows and turned out s'mores in the church kitchen microwave.  A big hit with the younger set and some of their dads as well.   Thanks so much, Michelle, Carol

Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2008 05:58PM - edited Jul 16, 2008 05:59PM by lorac Hi Mimi1030 How about Coronation Chicken?  I had it in Oxford about four years ago and loved it. xxx   Lorac
